mapper.select: select user_no as no, user_id as id, user_is_host as isHost, user_name as name, user_pwd as pwd, user_email as email, user_tel as tel, user_registered_date as registeredDate, user_deleted as deleted, user_pnt as pnt, user_image as image, user_gender as gender, user_reported_count as reportedCount from tb_final_users order by user_no desc
